snippet.title: Let's! Revolution! Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2111090/Lets_Revolution/
And visit https://letsrevolution.com/ for more details!

▾ About Let’s! Revolution!

Let’s! Revolution! is a colorful roguelite puzzle mashup that blends the rules of Minesweeper with procedurally generated mazes. Embark on a perilous game of hide and seek as you flip tiles to uncover the path to your goals. Chase down a cowardly King through the realms of Beebom while facing off against a host of enemies in strategic turn-based combat. Gear up along the way with powerful items and abilities for a final showdown with the King in Beebom City. 

Let’s! Revolution! is the first original game from BUCK, a creative services company with a two-decade-long track record of award-winning commercial animation and design. The game features original music and sound design by world-class audio makers Antfood who brought together an international team of musicians to produce an eclectic sound that brings the world and characters of the game to life. 

Follow Let’s! Revolution! on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/letsrevolution/
Follow Let’s! Revolution! on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@letsrevolution
Or heckle the evil King of Beebom on Twitter: https://twitter.com/king_of_beebom

▾ About BUCK

BUCK is an award-winning global creative company with clients including Apple, Microsoft, Riot Games, and more. The core BUCK games team includes industry veterans with expertise in both AAA and indie-game development with the support of the diverse, creative perspective of BUCK’s world-class artists and designers. 

▾ About Antfood

Antfood is a creative audio studio in New York, Los Angeles, Amsterdam, and São Paulo. Through music and sound, we elevate the art and effectiveness of the human experience. Working in linear media, gaming, and experiential, Antfood’s diverse teams collaborate in world-class studios to craft the best work — together. We take pride in the details. We are creative problem-solvers and use our expertise to tell stories, evoke emotion, and empower ideas through sound.

Antfood on Spotify: https://rb.gy/tqr9g
